content.question: The graph of the function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> shown consists of a semicircle centered at the origin and three line segments. If <math alttext="g of x equals, the integral from negative 2 to x, of, open parenthesis, f of t, plus 1, close parenthesis, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="g of 8 equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
